H0.text: The original Ferris Wheel was erected in which US state for the 1893 World’s Columbian Exposition. California

H1.text: The original Ferris Wheel was erected in which US state for the 1893 World’s Columbian Exposition. New York

H2.text: The original Ferris Wheel was erected in which US state for the 1893 World’s Columbian Exposition. Ohio

H3.text: The original Ferris Wheel was erected in which US state for the 1893 World’s Columbian Exposition. Ill.

A4.text: it was the tallest attraction at the World's Columbian Exposition in Chicago, Illinois, where it opened to the public on June 21, 1893
